actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide nonstop service between any  two points if such authority is not utilized within a certain period of time.

summary.text: Requires the Civil Aeronautics Board, under the Federal Aviation Act, after notice and hearing, to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide nonstop service between any two points if such authority is not utilized within any continuous one year period.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to rescind the authority of any air carrier to provide nonstop service between any  two points if such authority is not utilized within a certain period of time.
